SummaryEnglish: A gray and white kitten with black stripes wanders away from her mother and siblings one day while enjoying a walk outside with her family. Lost in her surroundings, the kitten struggles to find her family and instead is found by a young boy, Yohei, and his mother. They take the kitten home, but pets are not allowed in their housing complex, they try to find a new home for the kitten. This proves to be difficult, and the family eventually decides to keep the kitten, naming her "Chi".
Aliases: チーズスイートホーム あたらしいおうち
こねこのチー ポンポンらー大冒険
こねこのチー ポンポンらー大旅行

1.SummaryEnglish: Father buys a collar for Chii but seems to have some trouble adjusting its size. Chii gets bored with his attempts and goes for a walk in the park where she meets Kocchi near the fountain. Kocchi wants to drive her away from what he considers his territory. However, Chii is utterly clueless about that and simply wants to play with him.
Chi ends up lost when walking with her family.

2.SummaryEnglish: Chi is found by a young boy and his mother.

3.SummaryEnglish: Mr and Mrs Yamada try to give Chi a bath.

4.SummaryEnglish: Chi wants to go home, but is distracted by a number of new experiences.

5.SummaryEnglish: Settling into her new home, Chi struggles to understand where the toilet is.

6.SummaryEnglish: After Chi mistakes his bag for a toilet, Mr. Yamada sets out to buy a litter box for her.

7.SummaryEnglish: The newspaper Chi was playing on is replaced with a litter box.

8.SummaryEnglish: Chi believes she understands why people say a certain word to her a lot.

9.SummaryEnglish: Chi remembers her mother and tries to go out and find her.

10.SummaryEnglish: Asleep after a long day, Chi has dreams and nightmares about her past.

11.SummaryEnglish: The Yamadas believe they have found a new owner for Chi, but Chi isn't so sure.

12.SummaryEnglish: The Yamadas decide they will keep Chi themselves as they can't give her to anyone.

13.SummaryEnglish: Yohei is told to clear up some bouncy balls, but Chi knocks them down.

14.SummaryEnglish: Mr. Yamada worries that Chi doesn't have any toys.

15.SummaryEnglish: Chi has a bundle of new toys, but doesn't know what to do with them.

16.SummaryEnglish: Mr. Yamada is trying to work. Chi has other ideas.

17.SummaryEnglish: After Mrs. Yamada frightens her, Chi dashes out of the apartment.

18.SummaryEnglish: Chi discovers the world outside the apartment.

19.SummaryEnglish: While Yohei searches for her outside, Chi has fun discovering the local park.

20.SummaryEnglish: The park becomes lonely and scary at night.

21.TitleEnglish: Chi Goes to the Hospital - Part 1
21.SummaryEnglish: It's time for Chi's health checkup, but how to smuggle her out?

22.TitleEnglish: Chi Goes to the Hospital - Part 2
22.SummaryEnglish: The landlady nearly spots Chi, but Yohei's quick thinking saves the day.

23.TitleEnglish: Chi Goes to the Hospital - Part 3
23.SummaryEnglish: Chi's first medical check-up is a traumatic experience.

24.SummaryEnglish: Chi is afraid that Mr. Yamada wants to take her for another check-up, and won't come near him.

25.SummaryEnglish: Chi wants to scratch something. Unfortunately, her objects of choice are very expensive.

26.SummaryEnglish: Mr. Yamada gets a new pair of jeans, but Chi prefers the old ones.

27.SummaryEnglish: The Yamadas buy Chi a board to scratch, but she isn't sure what it's meant to do.

28.SummaryEnglish: Mr. Yamada undertakes the dangerous mission of clipping Chi's claws.

29.SummaryEnglish: Mrs. Yamada needs to go shopping, but Chi wants to come along for the ride.

30.SummaryEnglish: Things are inexplicably boring around Chi's house, and dinner is unusually large... a conspiracy is afoot to help her become independent.

31.SummaryEnglish: It's Chi's first day home alone, but Mr. Yamada is worried about her.

32.SummaryEnglish: Chi learns that an apartment without humans in it isn't as delightful as it seemed.

33.SummaryEnglish: Mrs. Yamada needs to take out the trash, but Chi clings to the bag. Mrs. Yamada distracts Chi with a ball, but while Mrs. Yamada is out, Chi climbs to a window and is almost seen.

34.SummaryEnglish: Mrs. Yamada takes away the books and boxes so Chi can't climb to the window. However, when Chi jumps, she's just a few centimeters short of reaching the windowsill.

35.SummaryEnglish: Chi is able to jump up to the windowsill, so Mrs. Yamada closes the door to Mr. Yamada's workroom. This angers Chi. Mr. Yamada buys a stuffed animal.

36.SummaryEnglish: When talking with some neighbors outside, Mrs. Yamada thinks they've seen Chi in the window. However, it was the stuffed animal that Mr. Yamada bought. So, they buy more stuffed animals to put on the windowsill so Chi blends in.

37.SummaryEnglish: Chi searches for a delicious snack, then later eats Yohei's pancakes and finds them delicious.

38.SummaryEnglish: Chi thinks that everything Yohei plays with is prey. So, Yohei tries to find things Chi will not like, but only makes Chi happier and then she rubs against Yohei's hand.

39.SummaryEnglish: Chi becomes suspicious of how much fun Yohei and Dad are having fun in the bath, so she goes in to see what they are doing. After Yohei pours toys in the tub, Chi looks over them and wants to play but unfortunately falls into the tub.

40.SummaryEnglish: Yohei and Chi are both annoying each other with their bad sleeping postures, then later sleep comfortable together.

41.SummaryEnglish: While Chi and Yohei are playing in the sand box, a large black cat appears from behind the bushes so they run inside and the black cat walks into their home.

42.SummaryEnglish: The black cat appears again in the Yamada house and eats Chi's dinner while the others are away.

43.SummaryEnglish: After eating Chi's dinner, the black cat picks her up and walks over to take her chew toy and Chi tries to protect it. Then the black cat decides to groom Chi's back and so Chi realizes the cat isn't as mean as it looks. And leaves once again into the bushes.

44.SummaryEnglish: Everyone tells Dad about the large black cat at dinner.

45.SummaryEnglish: Chi wants to play with everyone but everyone is too busy. Once they all come together to play with her, she dislikes the attention and walks away.

46.SummaryEnglish: Chi tries to grab the Yamada family's attention when they sit together and discuss how they should go to Kyoto after seeing a postcard from Grandma.

47.SummaryEnglish: Chi is house sitting again and gets her tail stuck to a roll of tape.

48.SummaryEnglish: Chi tries to remove the tape off her tail, and in the process she wrecks Dad's room.

49.SummaryEnglish: Chi follows the black cat and talks to it.

50.SummaryEnglish: The black cat hides Chi from a dog, then later tells her that she's a cat.

51.SummaryEnglish: Chi hides from a dog, then can't find her way home.

52.SummaryEnglish: Chi returns home by taking advice from the big black cat by looking at the sky.

53.SummaryEnglish: Dad tries to take Chi to the vet, so she runs outside. The land lady almost sees her until the black cat jumps out of a window saving the Yamada family and Chi.

54.SummaryEnglish: Dad brings out the basket to take Chi to the vet, but Chi knows the basket means she's going to the vet so she runs away every time they try to put her in there. Until she traps herself and Yohei catches her.

55.SummaryEnglish: Chi goes to the vet after Yohei captures her. When she returns home the black cat tells her not to trust humans, but Chi doesn't know what trust is.

56.SummaryEnglish: Chi returns home just to eat, but gets a treat of Tuna of tells the Yamada family to be her comrades.

57.SummaryEnglish: There's a storm coming to the Yamada home.

58.SummaryEnglish: When Yohei goes outside to get his toy truck from being swept by the storm, Chi is left outside.

59.SummaryEnglish: Dad finds Chi outside the window in the storm.

60.SummaryEnglish: The power goes out in the Yamada house, so Dad brings out the flashlight and Chi chases it, then Mom and Yohei all play with Chi with the flashlight in the dark.

61.SummaryEnglish: Yohei becomes ill, but Chi still wants to play. So she stands over him while he sleeps, then eventually cuddles and sleeps next to him.

62.SummaryEnglish: Mom becomes sick so Yohei tries to help her.

63.SummaryEnglish: After Yohei and Mom are no longer ill, Dad catches a cold.

64.SummaryEnglish: Dad is trying to get better but all Chi wants to do is play.

65.SummaryEnglish: Chi tries a tasty cat treat and refuses to eat her dinner.

66.SummaryEnglish: Yohei and Dad are out, so Mom catches up on some housework and accidentally scares Chi while cleaning the floors, so she bribes her with snacks.

67.SummaryEnglish: While getting ready to go out Mrs. Yamada loses her ring, Chi then helps her find her ring

68.SummaryEnglish: Chi looks for a place to nap, then ends up kneading and falling asleep on Mrs. Yamada

69.SummaryEnglish: Chi gets her gets a taste of milk an ends up wanting more so she tries to think of a way to get more, but ends up eventually forgetting about the milk while playing with a plastic bag

70.SummaryEnglish: The Yamadas decide to make a meal for Chi, but when they give it to her they forget to cool the meal and Chi gets end up mad

71.SummaryEnglish: Chi finds where her food is stored and ends up eating all she wants, Mr. and Mrs. Yamada then worrys if she is sick when she doesn't eat her food but later finds out why she hadn't eat

72.SummaryEnglish: While the Yamadas eat dinner they end up giving bits of their food to Chi which makes her believe all food on the table is yummy. To make her stop begging for their food they put her cat food dish and her on the table making her happy

73.SummaryEnglish: Chi's shedding season has started leaving fur all over the house. Then a woman from the neighborhood stops by so the Yamadas have to hide Chi and all her fur as well

74.SummaryEnglish: Chi's shedding so Mr. Yamada decides to buy a brush for Chi. Chi ignores Mr. Yamada's attempt to brush her a first but once he starts she really likes being combed for it reminds her of something from her past

75.SummaryEnglish: Chi really likes being brushed so she ends up following Mr. Yamada everywhere asking to be brushed. Chi ends up getting what she wants asking to be brushed to the point where Mr. Yamada's arm starts to get tired

76.SummaryEnglish: After being brushed Chi leaves fur on the brush which Yohei then collects until he has enough for a large ball. When Mr. Yamada discovers what Yohei has been doing the family talks about it until Chi grabs the ball of fur and starts to play with it sending fur flying everywhere

77.SummaryEnglish: Chi and Yohei both want to play but seem to have different definitions of fun, Mrs. Yamada then tells them to clean up so they can have snacks and while cleans the two find a way to play together and have fun.

78.SummaryEnglish: Chi and Yohei decide to play hide-and-seek.

79.SummaryEnglish: Playing hide-and-seek with Yohei, Chi hides in a dresser drawer, but when Yohei goes to have a snack he forgets about finding Chi, While Chi falls asleep in the dresser drawing which Mrs. Yamada later closes. Later that nightThe Yamadas realize Chi missing.

80.SummaryEnglish: Yohei remembers The about the game of hide-and-seek and the Yamadas start looking for Chi, While Chi wakes up and trying to escape the drawer. The Yamadas then later find Chi after Mrs. Yamada remembers closing the drawer.

81.SummaryEnglish: Chi learns how to open the screen door when the black bear cat shows her how, Chi also learns How to mark her territory and hunt prey by learns from the black bear cat, even though she messes up the black bear cats hunting prey.

82.SummaryEnglish: Chi continues to follow the black bear cat, then chases pigeons, no matter what Chi does shes can't catch any pigeons, even after trying to catch them like the black bear cat does prey.

83.SummaryEnglish: Chi chases pigeons while the black bear cat watches but she can't catch any. After being laughed at by a pigeon, the black bear cat tells Chi to sneak up on the pigeons using the bushes and so she does but when she leaps at the pigeons they all fly up at her and she fails to catch any.

84.SummaryEnglish: While Chi and the black bear cat head home, they spot another cat urinating on a car. Black bear cat, furious because the car is part of his territory, chases the other cat away. Unfortunately, the car's owner sees the urine on his bumper and blames the black bear cat. Chi and the black bear cat are forced to flee to Chi's house.

85.SummaryEnglish: Chi opens the screen door and tries to go outside when Yohei stops her. As the Yamadas try to figure out why the screen door was left opens they then watch as Chi opens the screen door again and tries to escape, again. They stop Chi from going outside again and this time put up wede the screen door shut so she can't open it herself

86.SummaryEnglish: The Landlady drops by for a visit so the Yamadas must hide Chi from her and all evidence of her.

87.SummaryEnglish: With the Landlady visiting, Youkei and Chi hide in the bathroom but unfortunately because Chi wants to play, The Yamadas have to try to make up excuses so she doesn't find Chi.

88.SummaryEnglish: Mr. and Mrs. Yamada discuss what they should do with Chi but Chi keeps distracting them by wanting to play.

89.SummaryEnglish: Mr. Yamada wants to take a picture of Chi but every time he is about to take the picture Chi moves, so when they finally get her to look at the camera, Chi really doesn't like the flash.

90.SummaryEnglish: Juri comes over for a visit but Chi doesn't seem to happy about her coming, deciding she can't let her guard down around Juri.

91.SummaryEnglish: Juri's brought a Crab with her from her home and Chi's interesred in the live crab, also Juri decides to pet Chi but is a little to rough but in the end Chi thinks it's fun.

92.SummaryEnglish: Chi's taken a liking to Juri and they start playing, leaving Yohei feeling left out.

93.SummaryEnglish: Chi follows the black bear cat outside and the black bear cat and Chi try to steal food but end up being seen by the landlady and another resident.

94.SummaryEnglish: Chi and the black bear cat escape from the landlay and are chased outside, meanwhile Yohei and Mrs. Yamada look for Chi and end up seeing Chi and the black bear cat's escape, Chi and the black bear cat then run into a building and up the stairs.

95.SummaryEnglish: Chi and the black bear cat escape from the landlady by taking refuge in the black bear cat's home, But the landlady finds out where the black bear cat is staying so they have to escape out the window. Yohei and Mrs. Yamada continue to follow Chi's trail.

96.SummaryEnglish: Chi must jump out the window to the roof of another building but is too scared to do so, so the black bear cat tells her to "smile and look forward" giving her the courage to jump. Then while Chi and the black bear cat are getting down from the roof using a tree, Yohei seeing the black bear cat helping Chi.

97.SummaryEnglish: The Yamadas discuss how Chi was seen by the landlady, while Chi climbs the curtains and ends up stuck and tangled.

98.SummaryEnglish: The landlady sends out a notice stating that pets are forbidden in the apartments but Chi wants to go outside and visit the black bear cat.

99.SummaryEnglish: Chi is sad that she's not allowed to go outside and play with the black bear cat so Chi waits by the door all day wishing to go out, while Mr. and Mrs. Yamada discuss whats best for Chi.

100.SummaryEnglish: Chi is sad and staring at the moon wanting to go outside when the black bear cat appears at the door, Chi then begs Yohei to open the door so that Chi can play with the black bear cat and Yohei gives in and opens the door making Chi happy.

101.SummaryEnglish: The black bear cat brings Chi a "souvenir" and plays with her. Then as the black bear cat leaves Chi asks for the black bear cat to play with her again later and the black bear cat agrees, then leaves.

102.SummaryEnglish: The Yamadas and Chi watch as The black bear cat and his family pack up and move and as the black bear cat leaves Chi doesn't realize the black bear cat is moving.

103.SummaryEnglish: The black bear cat moves away so Chi is sad.

104.SummaryEnglish: Chi discovers that the black bear cat is still there, she just can't see him.

1.SummaryEnglish: The Yamada family talks about whether they should send Chi to Juri in Hokkaido or not.

2.SummaryEnglish: Dad dreams that Chi is taken away to Hokkaido by Juri.

3.SummaryEnglish: Youhei overhears Mom and Dad talking about sending Chi away and runs away with her. Chi runs from Youhei when he is talking with his parents in the park and chases a bird.

4.SummaryEnglish: Chi comes back to the family, and they decide that instead of sending her away, they will move to a house where pets are allowed.

5.SummaryEnglish: The Yamada family packs their belongings while Chi is trapped in a box without their knowing.

6.SummaryEnglish: Chi is isolated in the bathroom while the movers take the boxes and imagines all the bad things the noises would be.

7.SummaryEnglish: Chi comes out of the bathroom and goes to new home with the Yamada family.

8.SummaryEnglish: The Yamada family takes Chi to the new home, but Chi does not want to come out of the box, thinking it is the animal hospital.

9.SummaryEnglish: While Chi is in the new home, she picks up strange smells around the house. She wants to return to the old house.

10.SummaryEnglish: Chi makes everything in her new home smell like her.

13.SummaryEnglish: Chi figures out how to use the kitty-door.

14.SummaryEnglish: Chi and the Yamadas visit their new neighbors, Akashi who owns a parakeet, Lucky, and Furukawa who owns a rabbit, Mi-chan.

15.SummaryEnglish: Chi and the Yamadas continue to meet their new neighbors, including a woman named Ijyuin with a golden long-haired cat named Alice.

16.SummaryEnglish: Chi and the Yamadas meet their next-door neighbor, Kusano Yuki with a dog, David.

17.SummaryEnglish: Chi finally goes outside to her new backyard.

18.SummaryEnglish: Chi isn't happy with the dog David from next door, but discovers that David can't come in her backyard.

19.SummaryEnglish: Chi's neighbor Alice comes into her home.

20.SummaryEnglish: Chi chases a butterfly and goes into the Kusano's yard.

21.SummaryEnglish: Chi discovers the outside of her yard.

22.SummaryEnglish: Chi follows other cats and wanders away from home.

23.SummaryEnglish: Chi goes back to her old home but notices something and wonders where her home is.

24.SummaryEnglish: Chi meets an orange, black and white cat named Mike and is invited to his house. He asks Chi if she wants to stay at his place instead.

25.SummaryEnglish: Chi comes back from outside and leaves pawprints everywhere at home.

26.SummaryEnglish: Chi is stopped by the Yamadas from touching many things.

27.SummaryEnglish: Youhei invites his friends Mayu and Ryu, and introduces Chi. However, Ryu is scared of cats.

28.SummaryEnglish: Chi gets angered by Ryu, and Youhei's friends tries to make up for Chi.

29.SummaryEnglish: Chi meets the pet store lady and she falls in love with Chi.

30.SummaryEnglish: Chi is followed by the pet store lady and loses her. Mr. Yamada brags about Chi to the pet store lady.

31.SummaryEnglish: Chi is carried in a kitty bag and Mr. Yamada comes to the pet store again to bet who is the cutest cat.

32.SummaryEnglish: Chi meets the pet store lady again and escapes from her.

33.SummaryEnglish: Chi visits the Furukawas, sees Mi-chan the rabbit, and waits.

34.SummaryEnglish: Chi visits the Akashi thinking that Lucky is food but Lucky impersonates Chi.

35.SummaryEnglish: Chi likes to go through things.

36.SummaryEnglish: Chi tries to sleep, and then plays.

37.SummaryEnglish: Youhei gets his birthday present and Chi likes it.

38.SummaryEnglish: Ms. Yamada gets Youhei's Birthday party ready and hopes Chi doesn't ruin it.

39.SummaryEnglish: Youhei's Birthday party begins and Chi is frightened of Youhei's present.

40.SummaryEnglish: Youhei's Birthday party ends and Mr. Yamada has the new pictures developed. The Yamadas realize that it's the first birthday that Chi has ever been to.

41.SummaryEnglish: Chi goes out of her yard again and chases a butterfly. Chi wanders off again, this time to an arcade street.

42.SummaryEnglish: Chi is rescued by a cat with a ribbon around its neck named Tama, and Tama keeps telling Chi to be careful.

43.SummaryEnglish: Chi follows Tama to a cat meeting for the first time to meet other cats, including the elder cat Fuji-San.

44.SummaryEnglish: The cat meeting begins, and Fuji-San just says comforting things to the cats.

45.SummaryEnglish: Chi visits Ijyuin's place to see Alice.

46.SummaryEnglish: Mrs. Yamada takes Chi to a pet salon for the first time with Ijyuin and Alice.

47.SummaryEnglish: Mr. Yamada tries to open Chi's mouth to brush her teeth.

48.SummaryEnglish: Mr. Yamada buys stuff from the pet store and again tries to brush Chi's teeth.

49.SummaryEnglish: The Yamadas want to go on a trip but are afraid that Chi can't come, so Mr. Yamada and Youhei take Chi to ride a bus first.

50.SummaryEnglish: The Yamadas want to go on a trip with Chi and so they decide to get a car.

51.SummaryEnglish: The Yamadas drive their new car around the neighborhood with Chi.

52.SummaryEnglish: Mr. Yamada is getting used to driving, and they go to a drive-through to get lunch. Then Chi gets out through the window.

53.SummaryEnglish: The Yamadas decide to go play tennis while Chi plays with tennis balls.

54.SummaryEnglish: Mr. and Mrs. Yamada plays tennis with each other and Chi wants to play with the tennis ball.

56.SummaryEnglish: Chi is carried to the cat meeting by Fuji-San and then David scares the other cats.

57.SummaryEnglish: The Tanabata (Bamboo) Festival comes and the Yamadas get a bamboo tree to decorate , but Chi comes back home.

58.SummaryEnglish: Since the bamboo tree is ruined, the Yamadas use a Christmas tree instead, and Youhei makes a wish.

59.SummaryEnglish: Chi goes out, and then it rains.

62.SummaryEnglish: Mrs. Yamada tries to vacuum the house, but Chi doesn't want to move.

63.SummaryEnglish: Chi and Youhei are in sync together.

64.SummaryEnglish: Youhei and Chi are home alone.

65.SummaryEnglish: Tama and Alice argue about whose food is better, and Chi acts as the judge.

66.SummaryEnglish: Tama and Alice keep and eye on Chi. As the argue, she wanders off.

67.SummaryEnglish: Chi wanders away and learns how to climb a tree, but can't get down.

68.SummaryEnglish: Chi is stuck in a tree and Ryu rescues Chi to overcome his fear.

69.SummaryEnglish: Summer has come and the Yamadas plan to have nagashi-soumen, which is noodles eaten straight from water flowing through little bamboo canals.

70.SummaryEnglish: The Summer Festival has come and it is Chi's first time with Tama.

71.SummaryEnglish: Chi gets to experience the Summer Festival with Tama.

72.SummaryEnglish: Chi and Tama have a good time at the Summer Festival. Chi is found by the Yamadas and looks surprised at the fireworks.

73.SummaryEnglish: Mr. and Mrs. Yamada compete as to who understands Chi the best.

74.SummaryEnglish: Ms. Yamada buys Youhei a balloon.

75.SummaryEnglish: Chi follows the dog David, and shows off that she can go anywhere.

76.SummaryEnglish: Chi gets trapped in a garbage can and can't get out.

77.SummaryEnglish: The Yamadas and Chi are going to Hokkaido to visit Juri and her family. They take Chi along for the cruise but Chi has to stay in a cage.

78.SummaryEnglish: The Yamadas and Chi arrive in Hokkaido and are headed to Juri and her family's ranch.

79.SummaryEnglish: Juri shows Youhei and Chi the horses. Youhei rides together with Juri on a pony while Chi on the other hand has a different ride.

80.SummaryEnglish: It's bedtime for Youhei and Juri, but Youhei gets scared when Juri says that there are monsters.

81.SummaryEnglish: It's early morning, and the morning crowing from the rooster wakes Chi up. Chi finds herself some prey, and trouble.

82.SummaryEnglish: Juri shows Youhei and Chi the barn where they milk cows.

83.SummaryEnglish: It is the last day that the Yamadas and Chi are staying. Juri decides to show Youhei and Chi her treasure.

84.SummaryEnglish: The Yamadas and Chi finally leave the ranch, but then stop at a sunflower field and decide to take a picture. But then Chi follows a butterfly and meets a Northern Fox.

85.SummaryEnglish: Mr. Yamada has to work and can't play with Chi; But Chi always cause trouble and can't stay still.

86.SummaryEnglish: Kusano Yuki comes over to the Yamadas to play with David. Chi tries to play with David in the yard.

87.SummaryEnglish: The pet store lady comes to visit Chi and brings her some pet clothes. When Chi runs away from the pet store lady's dress-up session, Chi finds Youhei with Mrs. Yamada, playing with Mayu and Ryu. When the pet store lady finds her, there's a surprise.

88.SummaryEnglish: Chi is going to the cat meeting and Alice comes along and tries to fit in.

89.SummaryEnglish: Chi's favorite toy is worn out and Ms. Yamada tries to make a homemade toy for Chi to play with.

90.SummaryEnglish: Mr. Yamada is late for an important meeting, but in his haste, unknowingly takes Chi along.

91.SummaryEnglish: Youhei practices the piano for school and Chi wants to play too.

92.SummaryEnglish: The Yamadas decided to plant some flowers and Chi wants to play in their newly made garden.

93.SummaryEnglish: Chi remembers her first friend, the big black cat.

94.SummaryEnglish: Chi mistakenly gets into a pickup truck and goes out of town. Chi is lost and can't get home.

95.SummaryEnglish: Chi couldn't find her way home but finds some company led by Tiger.

96.SummaryEnglish: Chi sleeps at Tiger and his friend's place but wants to go home.

97.SummaryEnglish: Chi is on her way home until she meets Tama's little sister, Hana.

98.SummaryEnglish: Chi tries following the sun to find home, but encounters many obstacles. Everyone including the Yamadas continue looking for Chi.

99.SummaryEnglish: Chi still can't find her way home and collapsed with exhaustion. The Yamadas have not yet given up searching for Chi.

100.SummaryEnglish: Chi meets the big black cat again.

101.SummaryEnglish: Chi travels with the big black cat.

102.SummaryEnglish: Chi finds her way home and made a promise with the big black cat.

103.SummaryEnglish: The Yamadas go to the place where they first found Chi, and find Chi again.

104.SummaryEnglish: Chi finally returns home and so everyone holds a party for her. Everyone there is her family.
